If the meal has a duration: If Hearty meal or (Health recovery is 0 and meal has an effect)
Effect level set to Min level of the effect
column3: Effect level gets the SSAV of the effect added to it

If the meal has a duration: If health recovery is not 0 and meal has an effect

column4: Effect level set to Min level of the effect
column5: Effect level gets the SSAV of the effect added to it

If the meal has a duration: If health recovery is not 0 and meal has no effect
